rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a vestibule and display area, aligned according to Vastu principles ensuring positive energy flow.
Spacious living area connected to the central courtyard for natural light and ventilation. Large openings for window views.
A dining space adjacent to the living room, promoting communal gatherings in accordance with joint family norms.
Modern kitchen with integrated serving counters and storage spaces. Designed to promote efficient workflow as per local building norms.
Servants' quarters with a compact layout including living space, small kitchenette, and bathroom. Positioned at a corner for privacy.
A guest room that doubles as a study or extra sleeping area if needed; designed keeping family dynamics in mind.

openings.description: Large glass door leading from the entrance hall to the living area, ensuring natural light and visual connectivity with the courtyard.
Floor-to-ceiling windows overlooking the central courtyard, enhancing ventilation and brightness.
Small decorative window openings in the kitchen to maintain visual connection with the dining area while preserving privacy.
A separate door for servants' quarters, ensuring privacy and ease of access for service staff.
